Comments_List: The way human beings are portrayed in literature
Introduction into new history/theory of personhood.
Loved the texts, at times felt like it was difficult to fit them all into class. As mentioned, perhaps an undergraduate section, or just two smaller mixed sections.
Loved the mix of graduate and undergrad
Yes! Very interesting, especially as an undergraduate. You really get to learn a lot about how to approach questions about personhood, thinking both critically and very broadly.
